src:
【豪門爆姦情】得知老公外遇自己客戶　安晨妤第一時間先嗆小三
06 Nov 2019, 06:08 by 娛樂組
歌手安晨妤與元祖小開張劭緯結婚13年，皆幸福甜蜜樣，沒想到老公卻驚爆外遇，且對象是大黑松小倆口的千金邱威樺。
據悉，安晨妤得知老公長期外遇多女，且其中一位小三就是自己所開的「123網路電商」客戶， 第一時間完全沒辦法接受，在自己和邱威樺的一個共同公務群組中公開嗆聲，群組中的其他人皆嚇到，紛紛避而遠之，就怕掃到颱風尾。
安晨妤於今（6日）發聲明，表示已對小三提出通姦罪刑法訴訟，由於目前已進入司法審判階段，因此細節無法一一陳述。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 06:07
text:
[Grandeur's affair] I learned that my husband had an affair with my client.
06 Nov 2019, 06:08 by Entertainment Group
Singer An Chenxi and Yuanzu Xiaokai Zhang Weiwei have been married for 13 years. They are all happy and sweet. They did not expect her husband to be surprised by the affair, and the object is the Qianjin Qiuhua of the big black pine couple.
It is reported that An Chenxi learned that her husband had long-term affair and many women, and one of the three juniors was the "123 Internet E-commerce" customer he opened. He couldn't accept it at the first time. He was a common business group with Qiu Weihua. The public snoring, the other people in the group were scared, and they shunned away, afraid to sweep to the end of the typhoon.
An Chenxi issued a statement today (6th), stating that he has filed a criminal lawsuit against adultery for the crime of adultery. Since he has entered the judicial trial stage, the details cannot be stated one by one.
Update time|2019.11.06 06:07
